page.title: 06LITTLE MARCLE FARMING (4)
page.content: {Cider Apple Orchards } Most farms produce some cider apples even if only for their own use, & some keep bees to help pollination. The apples go to local cider factories, particularly Bulmers in Hereford. Fruit is harvested mechanically by "shakers" & the fallen apples scooped up & loaded into trailers for transport to the factories. In spring the blossom is a beautiful sight & attracts many visitors. {Soft Fruit } Strawberries, raspberries, tayberries, gooseberries & blackcurrants are grown commercially in the area & picked by casual workers.
